trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <see cref="E:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating" /> event.
You create a handler for the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating> event when you want to customize how the user's credentials are authenticated at run time.
trans-unit.target: Crear un controlador para el <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating> eventos cuando desea personalizar cómo se autentican las credenciales del usuario en tiempo de ejecución.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs> class supplies values to any <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating> event handler.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs> clase proporciona valores a cualquier <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating> controlador de eventos.

trans-unit.source: By using the properties available in this class, you can retrieve the user credentials to customize authentication.
trans-unit.target: Mediante el uso de las propiedades disponibles en esta clase, puede recuperar las credenciales de usuario para personalizar la autenticación.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService> class raises the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating> event before validating the user credentials.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService> clase genera el <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating> eventos antes de validar las credenciales de usuario.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService> class constructs an instance of the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs> object and passes it to any <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating> event handler.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService> clase construye una instancia de la <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs> objeto y lo pasa a cualquier <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating> controlador de eventos.

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.UserName%2A>, <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.Password%2A> and <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.CustomCredential%2A> properties to retrieve the user credentials.
trans-unit.target: Puede usar el <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.UserName%2A>, <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.Password%2A> y <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.CustomCredential%2A> propiedades para recuperar las credenciales de usuario.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.CustomCredential%2A> property can contain additional values that are required for authentication, such as an identification number.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.CustomCredential%2A> propiedad puede contener valores adicionales que son necesarios para la autenticación, como un número de identificación.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.Authenticated%2A> property indicates whether the user credentials are valid.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.Authenticated%2A> propiedad indica si las credenciales de usuario son válidas.

trans-unit.source: You set the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.Authenticated%2A> property to the result of your customized authentication.
trans-unit.target: Establece el <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.Authenticated%2A> propiedad al resultado de la autenticación personalizada.

trans-unit.source: In addition, you set the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.AuthenticationIsComplete%2A> property to `true` if you have checked the user credentials and do not want the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService> class to check user credentials through the default membership provider.
trans-unit.target: Además, establecer el <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.AuthenticationIsComplete%2A> propiedad `true` si ha activado las credenciales de usuario y no desea que la <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService> clase para comprobar las credenciales de usuario a través del proveedor de pertenencia predeterminado.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows an event handler that passes the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.UserName%2A> and <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.Password%2A> values to a custom membership provider to validate the user credentials.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo siguiente se muestra un controlador de eventos que pasa el <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.UserName%2A> y <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.Password%2A> valores a un proveedor de pertenencia personalizado para validar las credenciales de usuario.

trans-unit.source: The event handler sets <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.Authenticated%2A> to the return value of the <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ValidateUser%2A> method and sets <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.AuthenticationIsComplete%2A> to `true` so that the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService> class does not validate the credentials.
trans-unit.target: Los conjuntos de controlador de eventos <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.Authenticated%2A> al valor devuelto de la <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ValidateUser%2A> método y conjuntos de <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.AuthenticationIsComplete%2A> a `true` para que la <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService> clase no valida las credenciales.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the user credentials are valid.
<see langword="true" /> if the user credentials are valid; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Si las credenciales de usuario son válidas; en caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: If you authenticate user credentials in an event handler for the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating> event, set the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.Authenticated%2A> property to indicate whether the user credentials are valid.
trans-unit.target: Si autenticar las credenciales de usuario en un controlador de eventos para el <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating> conjunto de eventos, el <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.Authenticated%2A> propiedad para indicar si las credenciales de usuario son válidas.

trans-unit.source: If the user credentials are valid and no additional validation is needed, set <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.Authenticated%2A> to `true` and <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.AuthenticationIsComplete%2A> to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Si las credenciales de usuario son válidas y no se necesita ninguna validación adicional, establezca <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.Authenticated%2A> a `true` y <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.AuthenticationIsComplete%2A> a `true`.

trans-unit.source: You set the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.AuthenticationIsComplete%2A> property to indicate that the authentication service should bypass the default steps for authenticating a user.
trans-unit.target: Establece el <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.AuthenticationIsComplete%2A> propiedad para indicar que el servicio de autenticación debe omitir el valor predeterminado de los pasos para autenticar a un usuario.

trans-unit.source: The value in <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.Authenticated%2A> is used by the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService> class only if <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.AuthenticationIsComplete%2A> is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: El valor de <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.Authenticated%2A> utiliza la <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService> solo si de clase <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.AuthenticationIsComplete%2A> está establecido en `true`.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.AuthenticationIsComplete%2A> is `false`, the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService> class calls the default membership provider to validate user credentials, and then overwrites the value in <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.Authenticated%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Si <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.AuthenticationIsComplete%2A> es `false`, <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService> clase llama al proveedor de pertenencia predeterminado para validar las credenciales de usuario y, a continuación, sobrescribe el valor en <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.Authenticated%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows an event handler that passes <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.UserName%2A> and <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.Password%2A> values to a custom membership provider to validate the user credentials.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo siguiente se muestra un controlador de eventos que pasa <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.UserName%2A> y <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.Password%2A> valores a un proveedor de pertenencia personalizado para validar las credenciales de usuario.

trans-unit.source: The event handler sets <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.Authenticated%2A> to the return value of the <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ValidateUser%2A> method and sets <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.AuthenticationIsComplete%2A> to `true` so that the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService> class does not validate the credentials.
trans-unit.target: Los conjuntos de controlador de eventos <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.Authenticated%2A> al valor devuelto de la <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ValidateUser%2A> método y conjuntos de <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.AuthenticationIsComplete%2A> a `true` para que la <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService> clase no valida las credenciales.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the user credentials have been authenticated.
<see langword="true" /> if all the steps for validating the user credentials have been performed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Si no se ha realizado todos los pasos para validar las credenciales del usuario; en caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: You can set the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.AuthenticationIsComplete%2A> property to indicate whether the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService> class must authenticate the user credentials.
trans-unit.target: Puede establecer la <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.AuthenticationIsComplete%2A> propiedad para indicar si la <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService> clase debe autenticar las credenciales de usuario.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.AuthenticationIsComplete%2A> is `true`, the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService> class does not validate the user credentials through the default membership provider.
trans-unit.target: Si <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.AuthenticationIsComplete%2A> es `true`, la <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService> clase no valida las credenciales del usuario a través del proveedor de pertenencia predeterminado.

trans-unit.source: Instead, it uses the value in <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.Authenticated%2A> to determine whether to create an authentication cookie.
trans-unit.target: En su lugar, usa el valor de <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.Authenticated%2A> para determinar si se debe crear una cookie de autenticación.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.AuthenticationIsComplete%2A> is `false`, the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService> class validates the user credentials through the default membership provider and overwrites the value in the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.Authenticated%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Si <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.AuthenticationIsComplete%2A> es `false`, <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService> clase valida las credenciales del usuario a través del proveedor de pertenencia predeterminado y sobrescribe el valor en el <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.Authenticated%2A> propiedad.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows an event handler that passes <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.UserName%2A> and <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.Password%2A> values to a custom membership provider to validate the user credentials.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo siguiente se muestra un controlador de eventos que pasa <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.UserName%2A> y <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.Password%2A> valores a un proveedor de pertenencia personalizado para validar las credenciales de usuario.

trans-unit.source: The event handler sets <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.Authenticated%2A> to the return value of the <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ValidateUser%2A> method and sets <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.AuthenticationIsComplete%2A> to `true` so that the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService> class does not validate the credentials.
trans-unit.target: Los conjuntos de controlador de eventos <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.Authenticated%2A> al valor devuelto de la <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ValidateUser%2A> método y conjuntos de <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.AuthenticationIsComplete%2A> a `true` para que la <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService> clase no valida las credenciales.

trans-unit.source: Gets additional user values for authentication.
The values required for authentication other than user name and password.
trans-unit.target: Los valores necesarios para la autenticación que no sea el nombre de usuario y contraseña.

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.CustomCredential%2A> property to retrieve authentication values other than user name and password during the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating> event.
trans-unit.target: Puede usar el <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.CustomCredential%2A> propiedad para recuperar los valores de autenticación que no sea el nombre de usuario y la contraseña durante el <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating> eventos.

trans-unit.source: For example, an application might be configured to validate an identification number together with the user name and password.
trans-unit.target: Por ejemplo, una aplicación podría configurarse para validar un número de identificación junto con el nombre de usuario y la contraseña.

trans-unit.source: In that case, the identification number will be passed in the `CustomCredential` parameter of the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Login%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: En ese caso, el número de identificación se pasará en el `CustomCredential` parámetro de la <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Login%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: You can then retrieve the custom value through the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.CustomCredential%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: A continuación, puede recuperar el valor personalizado a través de la <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.CustomCredential%2A> propiedad.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.CustomCredential%2A> property contains the customized values in the same format as they are passed to the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Login%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.CustomCredential%2A> propiedad contiene los valores personalizados en el mismo formato que se pasan a la <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Login%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: In the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating> event handler, if more than one value is stored in the property, you must parse the value of the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.CustomCredential%2A> property to retrieve the values.
trans-unit.target: En el <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating> controlador de eventos, si más de un valor se almacena en la propiedad, debe analizar el valor de la <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.CustomCredential%2A> propiedad para recuperar los valores.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows an event handler for the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating> event that parses two authentication values from the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.CustomCredential%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo siguiente se muestra un controlador de eventos para el <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating> eventos que analiza los dos valores de autenticación de la <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.CustomCredential%2A> propiedad.

trans-unit.source: It passes the two values and the user name and password to a custom authentication class named `StudentAuthentication`.
trans-unit.target: Pasa los dos valores y el nombre de usuario y la contraseña a una clase de autenticación personalizada denominada `StudentAuthentication`.

trans-unit.source: Gets the password for the user.
The password to validate.
trans-unit.target: La contraseña para validar.

trans-unit.source: You use the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.Password%2A> property to retrieve the password during the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating> event.
trans-unit.target: Usa el <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.Password%2A> propiedad que se va a recuperar la contraseña durante el <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating> eventos.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows an event handler that passes <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.UserName%2A> and <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.Password%2A> values to a custom membership provider to validate the user credentials.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo siguiente se muestra un controlador de eventos que pasa <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.UserName%2A> y <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.Password%2A> valores a un proveedor de pertenencia personalizado para validar las credenciales de usuario.

trans-unit.source: The event handler sets <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.Authenticated%2A> to the return value of the <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ValidateUser%2A> method and sets <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.AuthenticationIsComplete%2A> to `true` so that the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService> class does not validate the credentials.
trans-unit.target: Los conjuntos de controlador de eventos <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.Authenticated%2A> al valor devuelto de la <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ValidateUser%2A> método y conjuntos de <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.AuthenticationIsComplete%2A> a `true` para que la <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService> clase no valida las credenciales.

trans-unit.source: Gets the authentication name for the user.
The user name to validate.
trans-unit.target: Nombre de usuario que se va a validar.

trans-unit.source: You use the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.UserName%2A> property to retrieve the authentication name during the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating> event.
trans-unit.target: Usa el <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.UserName%2A> propiedad que se va a recuperar el nombre de autenticación durante la <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating> eventos.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows an event handler that selects a membership provider to use based on the value of the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.UserName%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo siguiente se muestra un controlador de eventos que selecciona un proveedor de pertenencia para usar en función del valor de la <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.UserName%2A> propiedad.

trans-unit.source: The handler passes <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.UserName%2A> and <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.Password%2A> values to the custom membership provider to validate the user credentials.
trans-unit.target: Las fases de controlador <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.UserName%2A> y <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.Password%2A> valores para el proveedor de pertenencia personalizado para validar las credenciales de usuario.

trans-unit.source: It sets <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.Authenticated%2A> to the return value of the <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ValidateUser%2A> method and sets <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.AuthenticationIsComplete%2A> to `true` so that the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService> class does not validate the credentials.
trans-unit.target: Establece <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.Authenticated%2A> al valor devuelto de la <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ValidateUser%2A> método y conjuntos de <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.AuthenticationIsComplete%2A> a `true` para que la <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService> clase no valida las credenciales.
